Title: Series: The Amarna Letters
Description: Clay cuneiform tablet; letter from Shuwardata to the king of Egypt; 15 lines; writing is very clear; left bottom corner is broken.
Bibliographic references: Knudtzon, J A 1915a / Die El-Amarna Tafeln (278)
Bezold 1892a / The El-Amarna Tablets in the British Museum (69)
Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.176)
Sigrist M et al 2006a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, III
Condition: Fair; left bottom corner is broken.
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
